title: Packers/Lions Recap & LAST CALL For Bandwagon Fans
itunes:title: Packers/Lions Recap & LAST CALL For Bandwagon Fans
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sesler and Gregg Rosenthal recap the rainy Monday night game between the Packers and Lions. The heroes are taking to the streets...on a wagon... a bandwagon and make their pitches for why you should join them. Split Ends' Colleen Wolfe joins the show to preview the TNF matchup between the Panthers and Texans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
